SEARCH

Package uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop

package uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop
  • Class
    Description
    BackgroundCell
    A background cell represents scenery or landscape in the railway simulation.
    BackgroundCell.BackgroundType
    Enumeration of possible background types for scenery cells.
    Carriage
    A railway carriage that can be attached to and pulled by a locomotive.
    CarriagePositionTest
    Unit tests for carriage positioning and history initialization.
    Cell
    Abstract base class for all cells in the game world grid.
    CollisionDetector
    A utility class for detecting collisions between vehicles in the railway simulation.
    CommandTest
    Test class to verify the carriage attachment/detachment and speed control functionality.
    CornerTrack
    A corner track cell where the railway makes a 90-degree turn.
    CouplingManager
    A utility class that manages coupling (attachment) between locomotives and carriages.
    CrossingRoutingTest
    Unit tests for junction routing logic.
    CrossingTrack
    A junction track cell where trains can be routed straight, left, or right.
    CrossingTrack.Mode
    The mode of the junction determines how trains are routed.
    DebugLevel
    Controls debug output verbosity for the simulation.
    GameWorld
    The game world containing a 2D grid of cells and game objects.
    GameWorld.GameImages
    A container class that holds all the images used in the simulation.
    GameWorld.RailwayWorldData
    A simple container class that holds the results of creating a railway world.
    GameWorld.VehicleState
    A helper class that stores the initial state of a vehicle.
    HistorySeedTest
    Verifies that locomotive history is pre-seeded so carriages animate smoothly from the first tick.
    ICommandLine
    Interface that defines a command-line processing capability.
    ImageUtil
    Utility class for loading and manipulating images used in the railway simulation.
    Locomotive
    A locomotive that can move along railway tracks and pull carriages.
    MovementException
    Exception thrown when a vehicle encounters an illegal movement situation.
    OOPrailwaySim
    OOP Railway Sim by Duncan Mullier
    Orientation
    Represents the four cardinal directions (compass directions) in the 2D grid.
    Position
    Represents a position (location) in the 2D grid world.
    RailCell
    Deprecated.
    Use TrackCell and its subclasses instead
    RenderingUtils
    Utility class for calculating rendering positions of vehicles on screen.
    Signal
    A railway signal that controls whether trains can enter a section of track.
    Signal.State
    The possible states of a railway signal.
    SimulationTest
    Simple test class to verify the railway simulation components work correctly.
    StraightTrack
    A straight track cell that connects in exactly two opposite directions: either horizontal (EAST-WEST) or vertical (NORTH-SOUTH).
    TrackCell
    Abstract base class for all track cells in the railway system.
    TrackCrossing
    Deprecated.
    This class uses the deprecated RailCell.
    TrackSwitch
    Deprecated.
    This class uses the deprecated RailCell.
    UserInterface
    The main graphical user interface window for the 2D Railway Simulation.
    Vehicle
    Abstract base class for all vehicles that can move on railway tracks.
    WorldRender
    Displays the railway simulation on the screen and handles animation.
